text: Sakari Halonen (1923–1992) was a Finnish singer and stage, film and television actor. ==Selected filmography== * The General's Fiancée (1951) * The Millionaire Recruit (1953) == External links == * Category:1923 births Category:1992 deaths Category:People from Kuopio Category:Finnish male singers Category:Finnish male stage actors Category:Finnish male film actors Category:Finnish male television actors Category:20th-century singers Category:20th-century male singers
